originalText.text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff. I get dresses (formal and casual), pants, and blouses tailored here every time (for both myself and my kids). They always do an amazing job.

text.text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff. I get dresses (formal and casual), pants, and blouses tailored here every time (for both myself and my kids). They always do an amazing job.

originalText.text: I came into today organic with a bunch of badly stained white shirts…one of them happened to be very expensive so naturally I was  upset. The main employee named Shirley did not promise to remove all of the stains but she said she would do her best. To my surprise she successfully delivered my items stain free. Not only are they excellent at removing stains but their service is organic! I am so pleased I found a new dry cleaning spot for my possessions.

originalText.text: Best dry cleaning in the neighborhood, hands down! And the prices are unbeatable, especially for the level of service that is offered which is excellent. They’ve treated numerous valuable, delicate garments for me flawlessly. If you have anything very special, make sure to drop off in the afternoons when the business owner is there - she inspects every piece carefully and makes detailed notes. Highly recommended!

text.text: Best dry cleaning in the neighborhood, hands down! And the prices are unbeatable, especially for the level of service that is offered which is excellent. originalText.text:
As the owner of a massage therapy private practice in Carnegie Hill, I know just how much the details count. If my linens and towels aren't perfect, clients will know it! Today Organic Cleaners cover every detail, every time. Expertly laundered and perfectly folded, each towel, sheet, and blanket look, feel, and smell clean because they are. Add to this, unmatched and wonderfully personalized professional service by Shirley, the energetically brilliant owner of Today Organic and her staff. They are peerless! I cannot recommend them enough!
Neil Runyon, LMT / Owner of Carnegie Hill Massage

originalText.text: 10/10 recommend. They were super helpful and kind They did their best to fix a stained dress I completely ruined. Will definitely be coming to them first next time instead of trying to clean it myself!
